description: This file contains functions to interact with authentication endpoints of the backend API, including login and registration. It uses an imported API client to perform POST requests with appropriate payloads.

methods.name: loginUser(email, password)
methods.description: Sends a login request with email and password to the backend, returns the token response.

methods.name: registerUser({ name, email, password, is_agent = false })
methods.description: Sends a registration request with user details to the backend, returns the registration response.

ctags.name: email
ctags.pattern: /^  const payload = { email, full_name: name || null, password, is_agent };$/

ctags.name: registerUser
ctags.pattern: /^export async function registerUser({ name, email, password, is_agent = false }) {$/

fields.name: const payload = { email, full_name: name || null, password, is_agent };
